Henson awards and nominations |- style="background:white;" colspan="3" style="text- align:center;" alt= Henson at the 2010 Independent Spirit Awards |- | colspan="3" | {| class="collapsible collapsed" style="width:100%;" ! colspan="3" style="background:#d9e8ff; text-align:left;"| Awards and nominations |- style="background:#d9e8ff; text-align:center;" !style="vertical-align: middle;"| Award | font-size:8pt; width:60px;"| Wins | font-size:8pt; width:60px;"| Nominations |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center;" | Totals |- | style="text-align:center;"| ;Academy Awards | | |- | style="text- align:center;"| ;BET Awards | | |- | style="text-align:center;"| ;Black Reel Awards | | |- style="background:#eef;" | style="text-align:center;"| ;Critics' Choice Movie Awards | | |- style="background:#eef;" | style="text- align:center;"| ;Critics' Choice Television Award | | |- style="background:#eef;" | style="text-align:center;"| ;Golden Globe Award | | |- style="background:#eef;" | style="text-align:center;"| ;MTV Movie & TV Awards | | |- style="background:#eef;" | style="text-align:center;"| ;NAACP Image Awards | | |- style="background:#eef;" | style="text-align:center;"| ;Primetime Emmy Awards | | |- style="background:#eef;" | style="text- align:center;"| ;Satellite Awards | | |- style="background:#eef;" | style="text-align:center;"| ;Screen Actors Guild Awards | | |} |- | | colspan=2 width=50 |- | | colspan=2 width=50 |} The following is a list of awards and nominations received by actress Taraji P. Henson. For her work in television, including starring in famous TV-series as Empire, Person of Interest and Boston Legal, she won a Golden Globe, and become the first African American woman to win a Critics' Choice Award for best actress in a drama series. She also received three Primetime Emmy Award nominations, two Screen Actors Guild Award nominations and won a Shorty Awards. In 2005 she was in Hustle & Flow's cast, which gave her first Screen Actors Guild Award nominations. Then in 2008 she acted in The Curious Case of Benjamin Button which made her famous as a film actress. She received an Academy Awards nomination as Best supporting actress. In 2016 she starred in Hidden Figures with Janelle Monáe and Octavia Spencer. The film received three Oscar nominations (Best Picture, Best Adapted Screenplay and Best Supporting Actress for Spencer) and two Golden Globe nominations. The actress won a Satellite Awards and a Screen Actors Guild Award with the cast of Hidden Figures. ==Major awards== ===Academy Awards=== |- | 2009 |The Curious Case of Benjamin Button | Best Supporting Actress | |} === Golden Globe Awards === |- | 2016 | Empire | Best Actress – Television Series Drama | |} === Primetime Emmy Awards === |- | 2011http://abc7.com/archive/8359122/ | Taken
